pages.text: Helyst - bewitching multi-faceted blue crystals. Don't stare into them for too long, or you might catch eye contact with one of the souls imprisoned there. Valuable Helyst ore is most often found in lithum outgrowths of the Dead Valley biome. By destroying the ore, you will get Raw Helyst, which must later be smelted into a Helyst Nugget. A single Helyst Crystal can be crafted from 9 nuggets.
